pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rail Trail Data for Trails in the United States from the Rails- to-Trails // Rail trail data from the excellent 'TrailLink' website, sponsored by the Rails-to-Trails Conservancy https://www.traillink.com/. Includes information (such as name, length, surface, and reviews) about more than 11,000 trails in every state in the United States. Data can be used to better recreational trail use in the United States.
